name: SmartTree
0:
”Alexa, tell smart tree white”
”Alexa, tell smart tree fade white”
skdetail:

Invocation Name: smart tree
Developer Terms of Use
des: Learn how to voice-activate Polygroup® Smart Trees & Smart Lights, our latest smart tree series that talks to Amazon Alexa for a completely hands-free product control experience.
